headline: Does Lemon's Bitcoin Credit Card Hint at V's Next Crypto Growth Lane?
summary: A Bitcoin-backed credit card on Visa's network lets users spend pesos while holding crypto, highlighting a new path for crypto-linked credit growth.

headline: Berkshire Hathaway Has 56% of Its Portfolio in These 4 Stocks. Are They Buys to Begin 2026?
summary: You can't go wrong with adding blue chip stocks to your portfolio.

headline: Trump credit card cap would cause once in a lifetime battle from banks
summary: While major bank stocks fall after reporting their fourth quarter earnings, President Trump's suggested 10% cap on credit card fees continues to weigh on the financial sector (XLF) and credit lenders. HSBC Head of US Financials Research Saul Martinez told Yahoo Finance on Tuesday that a policy like this would make the credit card industry largely "unprofitable." Whalen Global Advisors Chairman Chris Whalen explains how bank executives would respond to this type of legislation. Also catch Chris Whalen weigh in on the performance of Big Bank stocks in comparison to smaller counterparts. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out moreÂ Market Catalysts.
